description:
Tetsuro and the gang go to a planet full of industrious people. A planet that, although poor, is brimming with vigor. The husband and wife who run the inn where they are staying at are also hard workers. They are warmly welcomed. However, Tetsuro and Maetel lose their passes and luggage when a typhoon hits. Tetsuro suspects the husband and wife who run the inn, but...
Source: crunchyroll
